The sanity tests need to be updated to match this. They already handle the file extensions, but not the `.` prefix:

https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/4d675b6d876219780f234360b02ddee1ef3a0df1/test/sanity/code-smell/changelog.py#L18-L19

A similar change should be made to devel/stable-2.10 if the version of antsibull-changelog used there is updated to include the changes in https://github.com/ansible-community/antsibull-changelog/pull/33.
